text:
Deductions from employee pay warrants for charitable organizations shall only be withheld based upon authorizations made by employees in the Annual Joint Fundraising Drive. Each year the City and County of San Francisco shall hold an Annual Joint Fundraising Drive ("Annual Drive") in which its officers and employees are encouraged to participate. 
(Added by Ord. 429-88, App. 9/16/88)

heading.catch_text: CHARITABLE DEDUCTIONS AND THE ANNUAL JOINT FUNDRAISING DRIVE.
